parameters.name: Environment Setup
parameters.html:
Environment Setup

This page contains instructions for setting up your development environment for API development.

Prerequisites

  • Node.js 18+
  • Docker
  • Git

Installation Steps

  1. Clone the repository
  2. Install dependencies
  3. Configure environment variables
  4. Start the development server

parameters.name: JWT Implementation
parameters.html:
JWT Implementation Guide

Learn how to implement JSON Web Tokens for secure API authentication.

What is JWT?

JSON Web Tokens are an open, industry standard RFC 7519 method for representing claims securely between two parties.

Implementation Steps

// Generate JWT token
const token = jwt.sign({ userId: user.id }, process.env.JWT_SECRET, { expiresIn: '1h' });
